Class NodeLabelEditRequestedEventArgs

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Event args for node label edit request. Raised when a user double-clicks a node to edit its label.

public class NodeLabelEditRequestedEventArgs : EventArgs
